title: [INTERACTIVO] LoL Animado 2 - Ep 13: Comprando Con Braum

embed.description: LoL Animated is a weekly short animation about League of Legends ► Click here to see more LoL Animated ► http://bit.ly/1GGVpHR ► NEW LoL Animated Episode Every Friday ◄ ► Tweet us @ScurbOfficial with a champion you would like to see animated ◄ Scripted, Drawn and Animated by: PentaMagic ►

body: Unas de las mejores animaciones interactivas tiene este canal, que los disfruten.

replies.body:
Es mejor el "What would lee sin do?"

My mind is telling me no...
